Thanks [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com], yes will reorder those and also fix the checkstyle warning about ending the comment with a period shortly.
Uploading patch 002 that reorders the test case data and fixes the checkstyle comment.
+1 (non-binding) It looks good to me. Thank you, [~vrushalic]!
